definitions.definition: ( biblical ) The father of Hezron and the son of Judah ; the grandson of Jacob .
A Sephardic Jewish surname from Hebrew .

main_definition: ( biblical ) The father of Hezron and the son of Judah ; the grandson of Jacob .
secondary_definitions: A Sephardic Jewish surname from Hebrew .

definitions.definition: A surname from Spanish [in turn originating as a patronymic] .

main_definition: A surname from Spanish [in turn originating as a patronymic] .
